title: If you are a philosopher, what ideas are you going to impart in the field of philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: what kind of object might a tool present, except that it suggests some real world gesture. the tool can’t change into the nail to invent ‘hammer’. the boy can’t say the impossible thing without saying it from memory. far away, leaves are falling; too bored to stay, too anxious for answers.
